Reference

1. SPS framework functions

SPS core

sps()

SystemPipeShiny app main function

spsInit()

Create a SystemPipeShiny project

SPS plugin operation

SPS options

spsOption()

Get or set SPS options

viewSpsDefaults()

Print SPS default options

SPS tab manipulation

addData() getData()

Add and get data between SPS tabs

bsHoverPopover()

Bootstrap popover trigger on hover instead of click

canvasBtn()

Screenshot a plot or UI to SPS Canvas or download as an image

clearableTextInput()

A clearable text inputInput control

dynamicFile()

Dynamically generate Shiny file selection component

dynamicFileServer()

Server side function for dynamicFile

emptyIsFalse()

Empty objects and FALSE will return FALSE

gallery()

A shiny gallery component

genGallery()

Generate gallery by only providing tab names

genHrefTable()

Generate a table that lists tabs by rows

heightMatcher()

Match height of one element to the other element

hexLogo() hexPanel()

Hexagon logo and logo panel

genHrefTab() hrefTab()

Display a list of links in a row of buttons

hrefTable()

A table of hyper reference buttons

loadDF()

Load tabular files as tibbles to server

msg() spsinfo() spswarn() spserror()

SPS terminal message logging methods

pgPaneUpdate() pgPaneUI()

A draggable progress panel

quiet()

Suppress cat print output

removeSpsTab()

Remove a SPS tab

renderDesc()

Render some collapsible markdown text

shinyCatch()

Shiny exception handling

shinyCheckPkg()

Shiny package checker

sps()

SystemPipeShiny app main function

spsDb

SPS database functions

spsEncryption

SPS encryption functions

spsEzUI() spsEzServer()

Easy and simple UI and server for a SPS custom tab

spsHr()

hr line with color #3b8dbc38

spsInit()

Create a SystemPipeShiny project

spsNewTab()

Create a new SPS tab

spsOption()

Get or set SPS options

spsTabInfo()

View SPS project 'config/tabs.csv' information

spsTimeline() updateSpsTimeline()

A shiny timeline component

spsValidate()

Validate expressions

tabTitle()

h2 title with bootstrap info color

textInputGroup()

Text input with a button right next to

uiExamples()

Example UI elements for plotting

useSps()

Use SystemPipeShiny javascripts and css style

viewSpsDefaults()

Print SPS default options

SPS class

spsDb

SPS database functions

spsEncryption

SPS encryption functions

addData() getData()

Add and get data between SPS tabs
